sentences: The issue of Protocol Article 2.3 (adverse effects of P&Ms) was discussed by SBSTA on Thursday, 9 December.
The issues discussed included the degree of progress on Article 2.3 since COP-8.
Chair Benrageb consulted informally on this issue, but Parties were unable to reach agreement.
In the SBSTA plenary on Tuesday, 14 December, SBSTA adopted its conclusions.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
